name: Dental Filling
description: To treat a cavity your dentist will remove the decayed portion of the tooth and then 'fill' the area on the tooth where the decayed material was removed.

name: Dental Implant
description: A dental implant is an artificial replacement for the root part of a tooth. An implant takes the form of a small metal post which is screw or cylinder shaped and is usually made of titanium.

name: Regular-Checkup
description: Your daily efforts of brushing and flossing your teeth arenâ€™t enough. It will only help in preventing plaque buildup in some places. However, infections will continue developing in hidden areas. To prevent such a case from happening, you must visit a competent dentist regularly.
